Text: Thanks for this and many others!

WTF...Bettye says she hated the music of the Brit Invasion, that ..."nowhere would people play black music after that." She cried when she was told she had to sing "Love Reign..." when she got to sing to millions for the first time in her life. Now I gots to listen to her singing white people's music again. Oh well, that politics, baby.
I'm sorry for the comments I wrote that appear above. I was being insensitive.
